categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Slatka was a female Human Jedi Initiate serving the Jedi Order briefly during the Ruusan campaign at the end of the New Sith Wars.

A Force-sensitive Human, Slatka and her brother Sladak were native to a seafaring world without forests of trees. In 1000 BBY, the siblings were recruited into the Jedi Order's Army of Light by Jedi Knight Torr Snapit to augment the Army's forces on Ruusan. While descending through Ruusan's atmosphere Snappit's ship was attacked by Sith buzzards of the Brotherhood of Darkness and ultimately destroyed. As the ship broke apart, both Sladak and Slatka were killed before ever receiving anything more than rudimentary training.
